message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my budget under $120. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $110?

I understand you're looking to stay under $120, Bob, but I've already made a concession by offering it to you for $140 initially. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $127.50?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on a price of $120 for the product?
